edu.ucla.sspace.dependency
Class DependencyIterator

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucla.sspace.dependency.BreadthFirstPathIterator
      edu.ucla.sspace.dependency.DependencyIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<DependencyPath>
public class DependencyIterator
extends BreadthFirstPathIterator

A traversal class for iterating over a dependency tree of Relations. Given the tree and a starting index, the traverser will find all paths that satisfy several different criteria: length of the path and accepted relations in the path.

Note that this class is NOT thread safe.

Constructor Detail

DependencyIterator

public DependencyIterator(DependencyTreeNode startNode,
                          DependencyRelationAcceptor acceptor,
                          int maxPathLength)
Creates a new DependencyIterator that will return all DependencyPaths rooted at the term with index startTerm. Each link in the path will be valied with acceptor and weighted with weighter. Each path will have length 1 + maxPathLength.

Parameters:
startNode - the node that will start all the paths to be generated.
acceptor - The DependencyRelationAcceptor that will validate each link the a path
maxPathLength - the maximum length of any path returned
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if maxPathLength is less than 1
